document.title: SSA-589378:  Vulnerabilities in Android App SIMATIC Sm@rtClient

notes.title: Summary
notes.text:
The latest update for the SIMATIC Sm@rtClient Android app fixes two vulnerabilities. One of
the vulnerabilities could under certain conditions allow an attacker in a privileged network
position to read and modify data within a TLS session.
AFFECTED PRODUCTS
· SIMATIC WinCC Sm@rtClient for Android: All versions < V1.0.2.2
· SIMATIC WinCC Sm@rtClient Lite for Android (affected by vulnerability 2): All
versions < V1.0.2.2
DESCRIPTION
The Android app SIMATIC WinCC Sm@rtClient, in combination with the SIMATIC WinCC
Sm@rtServer, allows remote operation and monitoring of SIMATIC HMI systems.
Detailed information about the vulnerabilities is provided below.
